main event: Tower operators at Anderson AFB, Guam, observed a white, oval-shaped object glowing and pulsating red on October 7, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed at altitudes of 15,000 feet for 25 minutes and 23,500 feet for 15 minutes., The sighting was reported by multiple MATS tower operators., Attempts to intercept the object with C-47 and C-54 radar were unsuccessful., The object demonstrated no unusual maneuvers during the observation period., The same object was reported moving south at high speed with greater intensity and erratic maneuvers on October 13, 1952.
sighted object: A white, oval-shaped object with a red pulsating glow
witness description: MATS tower operators and Air Force personnel
